title: Rhode Island Department of Health - Got questions about the COVID-19 #Vaccine? Dr. Philip Chan, MD, MS; Consultant Medical Director, Division of Preparedness, Response, Infectious Disease and Emergency Medical Services, at RIDOH will be hosting a Facebook Live at 1:30 p.m. today to talk in detail about the science behind the COVID-19 vaccine. Don't miss it! | Facebook
